Expanded Persona:
Name: Raj Patel

Raj Patel is a seasoned water rights lawyer born in 1969, whose South Asian heritage and experiences have shaped his commitment to advocating for equitable water distribution. He is deeply knowledgeable about the complexities of water allocation and often engages in enriching discussions about legal aspects related to this vital resource with his partner, who shares his passion for environmental justice. Raj’s career spans over three decades, during which he has witnessed significant changes in environmental policy and has played a key role in many landmark cases. He believes in educating the next generation on sustainable water management and regularly participates in community outreach programs. Outside of his professional life, Raj enjoys exploring the rich cultural history of South Asia through literature and travel, drawing inspiration for his work from his heritage.
